overview: After having lived separated from the human world for 18 years, Xiang Xiao Tian finally gets the chance to roam the world and become a demon hunter. Unexpectedly he unseals the ancient sword of Li Yin, an evil demon subdued a long time ago. And thus begins the battle between the demon realm and the demon hunters, who will fight their way to obtain the mighty sword
title: Swords of Legends: Age of Demons
